seed_context.known: Even if he wanted to he wouldn't be able to.

practice_phrases.known: Even if she wanted to leave
Even if he wanted to help you
Even if he wanted to go out
Even if she wanted to know that
Even if he wanted to see her
practice_phrases.target: aunque él quisiera ver a ella

practice_phrases.known: Even if he wanted to leave me alone
Even if she wanted to go out on Friday night
practice_phrases.target: aunque ella quisiera salir el viernes por la noche

practice_phrases.known: Even if he wanted to see old friends
practice_phrases.target: aunque él quisiera ver a amigos viejos

practice_phrases.known: Even if he wanted to know what was happening
practice_phrases.target: aunque él quisiera saber qué estaba pasando
